snippet: The State Supreme Court unanimously ruled that all of Florida’s juvenile killers who received automatic sentences of life in prison must be resentenced under a law passed in 2014.
abstract: Florida State Supreme Court unanimously rules that juvenile murderers automatically given life sentences for their crimes must be resentenced under 2014 law requiring judge to consider several factors before determining sentence.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court unanimously ruled that all of Florida’s juvenile killers who received automatic sentences of life in prison must be resentenced under a law passed in 2014.

headline.main: Florida: Life Sentences for Juveniles Thrown Out
headline.print_headline: Florida: Life Sentences for Juveniles Thrown Out
